messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the art guy with the curly hair
messages.msgSnippet: ... I think his name was Bob Ross, he died a couple of years ago.  I m glad they still run his program though, it is fascinating. Mary
messages.messageBody:
>From: unschoolr2@...
>Reply-To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
>To: Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com
>Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] the art guy with the curly hair
>Date: Fri, 31 Mar 2000 09:29:47 EST
>
>Hi all, this is kind of OT, but does anyone know the name of the PBS artist
>with the curly hair? He is the one who is always painting a "happy" bush or
>tree.... LOL My DD loves to watch him, but I can't remember his name and I
>need the info for an article I am writing on TV and kids.
>Thanks
>Teri

I think his name was Bob Ross, he died a couple of years ago. I'm glad they
still run his program though, it is fascinating.

Mary

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the art guy with the curly hair
messages.msgSnippet: ... That s him and he died of cancer about 3-4 yrs ago. They had a tribute article to him in one of my painting magazines. Buzz (who wishes she would remember
messages.messageBody:
unschoolr2@... wrote:
>
> In a message dated 3/31/2000 6:59:13 AM Pacific Standard Time,
> LisaBugg@... writes:
>
> << Bob Ross??? >>
> That's it! Thanks Lisa!
> Teri

That's him and he died of cancer about 3-4 yrs ago.
They had a tribute article to him in one of my painting magazines.

Buzz (who wishes she would remember to make time to get back into
painting instead of lusting after those projects in her magazines)
